file_content.text: Someone ought to put a leash on those Selonians. Them and the rest of their furry friends.
I cleared out the Wookiees, Selonians and Drall for you.
That you did. Just got word the goods made it to Tradik safely. Here's your cut, as promised.
You've certainly got a way with those mongrels. Should've asked you to snag a few pelts while you were out there.
Still a few too many Wookiees and Drall running amok out there.
I'm ruined. Finished.
Those blasted Selonians, with their riots and their mangy hides!
Too busy fighting the Empire to think about the working man, the entrepreneur!
They'll be put down soon enough. Then you can go back to... whatever it is you do.
Give it time.
Arms dealing. At least until those rodents put me out of business.
Your problem, not mine.
This uprising hurts anyone trying to make a semi-honest living on Corellia.
Whining won't help.
I just don't like those animals getting between me and my payday.
Major Tradik's expecting me to deliver a shipment of military-grade ordnance, but the furball coalition won't even let a rumor get through.
It's not just Selonians, either. Wookiees, Drall... just about every fleabag in the galaxy is stonewalling me.
They wouldn't stop me.
I wouldn't let that stop me.
Hey, yeah, I bet you could do something about those walking carpets.
Looking for some muscle?
Assuming you can get the job done.
Force your way through.
I sell the goods, I don't use them.
It's not the end of the world.
I practically had to offer up my firstborn child to secure this contract. If I don't deliver....
Why come to me?
I'm sure you don't give a Cathar's hackles about me, but there's an entire regiment of Imperial troops waiting for this gear.
If you clear out those mongrels, I should be able to deliver the merchandise. Heck, I'll cut you in on a slice of the profits.
Works for me.
I'd do this for free.
So you'll do it? Maybe I'm not headed for financial ruin after all....
The Wookiees and the Drall are the ones I'm most concerned about. Thin their numbers a bit, and we'll be in business.
Not interested. [Refuse quest]
Thanks for nothing.
The Selonians are costing me a fortune!
